item.description:
AFP needs your help to kill the gas tax increase! The Senate Ways and Means Committee hearing will be on Tuesday the 7th at 10 AM in State House Room 103. Please plan to attend the hearing to show your opposition to the planned 67% tax increase on gas and diesel. If you can to share your story of how this large tax increase will affect your life and business, that will be a great help.

And everyone who turns out to testify or simply attend the hearing will receive a free "Stop the gas tax" AFP t-shirt and free pizza from Checkers!

http://americansforprosperity.org/new-hampshire/legislativealerts/is-your-wallet-feeling-lighter-these-days/
item.name: Stop the NH Gas Tax!
